DOC.criteria: Written inform consent Male female 18 year 65 year A positive clinical history inhalant allergy presumably due cat allergen . Positive screening prick test ( mean wheal diameter ≥ 3 mm ) test already standardize cat allergen extract . Positive screening prick test ( wheal diameter ≥ 3mm ) Histamine dihydrochloride 10mg/ml .
